name: leafminer

procedures: T1003.001::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne and Mimikatz.
T1003.004::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne.
T1003.005::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne.
T1018::[Leafminer] used Microsoft’s Sysinternals tools to gather detailed information about remote systems.
T1027::[Leafminer] obfuscated scripts that were used on victim machines.
T1046::[Leafminer] scanned network services to search for vulnerabilities in the victim system.
T1055.013::[Leafminer] has used [Process Doppelgänging] to evade security software while deploying tools on compromised systems.
T1059.007::[Leafminer] infected victims using JavaScript code.
T1083::[Leafminer] used a tool called MailSniper to search for files on the desktop and another utility called Sobolsoft to extract attachments from EML files.
T1110.003::[Leafminer] used a tool called Total SMB BruteForcer to perform internal password spraying.
T1114.002::[Leafminer] used a tool called MailSniper to search through the Exchange server mailboxes for keywords.
T1136.001::[Leafminer] used a tool called Imecab to set up a persistent remote access account on the victim machine.
T1189::[Leafminer] has infected victims using watering holes.
T1552.001::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne.
T1555.003::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne.
T1555::[Leafminer] used several tools for retrieving login and password information, including LaZagne.
T1588.002::[Leafminer] has obtained and used tools such as [LaZagne], [Mimikatz], [PsExec], and [MailSniper].

description: [Leafminer](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0077) is an Iranian threat group that has targeted government organizations and business entities in the Middle East since at least early 2017. (Citation: Symantec Leafminer July 2018)
